Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_02.Text: *: (yawn) Ahhh! Oh, hello to you, and welcome to the village of Norvik!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_03.Text: *: Hello to you, and welcome to the village of Norvik!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_02.Text: *: Hmm...? Was I sleeping? ...But why was I sleeping outside?
*: ...And why for so very long? For sure, the grass is having grown!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_03.Text: *: You are a traveller of the world, yes? Then you are knowing already, yes?
*: Then I am telling you! There is somewhere in the world a dark and fearsome den of pirates.
*: They will attack without warning any who sail too close. Ohh, it scares me just to think about it!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_02.Text: *: Ahh, I am having slept most deeply! For how many years was it, I wonder?
*: Ha ha! I joke! A man cannot sleep for years! Ha ha! How silly!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_03.Text: *: I have not been becoming tired lately, even in the night-times...
*: I am not troubled, at least not as far as I am aware... Perhaps I am unduly sensitive? Yes, perhaps this is it.

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_02.Text: *: Ach, I am not being tired at all yet! Pleeease may I play more?

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_02.Text: *: Ach, but the village is gone to rack and ruin!
*: I am only having slept briefly, and the weeds grow wild and the grass unruly!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_03.Text: *: Ach, but the village is gone to rack and ruin!
*: The weeds grow wild and the grass unruly, and though I cut and cut, it is never enough!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_02.Text: *: Oh, yes! I was on my way to play with Grandpapa! Yayyy!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_02.Text: *: So there I was, travelling the world, then I stopped in to visit this place, and...well, it's all a blank after that. (yawn)
*: Last I remember, I was trying to find out more about those rumours of the magic key being down in Asham.
*: What's that? Where's Asham? South-east of Romaria. From here, that's due, uh... Sorry, where are we again...?

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_03.Text: *: I stopped by this place while I was out travelling the world.
*: But when I went to leave again, the whole area was suddenly full of really tough monsters.
*: When did that happen? Now I can't leave! Gah, what a pain...

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810_01.Text: *: Ohh! I can hear them! I can hear them! I can hear all the people of the village talking!
*: I am still not knowing who you are, but thank you! Thank you so very, very much!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_MAIN_0_SCENE_0910_0.Text: Wakey dust could likely be used to rouse the villagers from their slumber.
Use the wakey dust on the villagers?
<Cap><DefSgl_I_NAME> scatters on the wind, and whirls throughout the village!
One by one, the villagers awaken!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_01.Text: *: People are always goin' on about 'ow useless gadabouts are<--->and they ain't wrong, to be fair. But wiv enough experience behind 'em, even those jokers can bloom into sumfink better.
*: Eh? Why am I tellin' you this? Cor, I ain't got the foggiest, now you come to mention it... I must still be 'alf asleep...

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_2110_01.Text: *: Mother is always telling me off, saying I need to stop stomping as it is unladylike. I am not trying to walk in a manner that is abnormal...
*: I actually heard thieves can tiptoe most quietly. Oh, I am hoping I may be able to meet one... Wait, but how would I hear them coming?

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: Oh, it seems I have fallen asleep for a short nap.
*: You are not having...watched me while I slept, are you?
*: Ugh! You are strange and unpleasant.
*: Hmph! You are a strange and unpleasant liar.
*: Oh, it seems I have fallen asleep for a short nap.
*: I am hoping I have not dribbled while I slept... This would be too embarrassing...
*: The boy who was living in the house just to the north of here, he fell into love with a faerie, and eloped.
*: Ahh, to fall so truly and deeply for another! It is what I am wanting more than anything in the world!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Inn_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: In the woods, I was attacked by monsters, and the mighty Ortega came to my grateful rescue and brought me safely to home...
*: Ohh, such big, strong arms... Such a rugged, handsome face... How I longed to love and be loved by that hardy hero.
*: It is really a shame that Ortega had to leave us...
*: He was gentle when he turned me down, at least. Told me his heart belongs to his wife and child...
*: Ohh, Ortega... My hero... Will you ever return to us? I am awaiting you so fiercely...
*: Your strong arms... Your rugged face... There is no other like you in all the world... Is there?
*: Hm? You? Perhaps there is being something of him in you, but...not enough, sadly.
*: Hm? You? But you are being a lady... Although...yes, perhaps there is something...
*: (sigh) No, you are right... He is being without compare...

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Inn_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: I have travelled the world, and met with many a great warrior.
*: But none compares to the mighty Ortega of Aliahan. He is a true hero.
*: Wait<--->forgive me<--->are you the son of Ortega?
*: Wait<--->forgive me<--->are you the daughter of Ortega?

*: I knew it! The resemblance is uncanny!
Anyway, I asked because he was staying in the adjacent room until only yesterday.
*: He spoke of travelling hence to Asham, where he hoped to acquire the magic key, but...
*: Can that really have been yesterday...?
*: I cannot shake the feeling that I have been in a deep slumber these last Goddess-knows-how-many years...
*: Apologies. I must have been mistaken.

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Room01_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Oh, where is my dear son? He has run away with a pretty young faerie, and not yet come home...
*: I was so hoping to bless their marriage. Ahh, young love... (sigh)
*: But where can they have gone to? And what can they be doing?
*: Oh, where is my dear son? He has run away with a pretty young faerie, and not yet come home...
*: My husband and I were so hoping to bless their marriage, so he set out to find them, but could not.
*: And now he is seeming so tired... So saddened...
*: If you are ever seeing my boy out in the world, please tell him... Tell them both... Please, to come home to us...

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_ItemShop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: *: 'Ere, did you know you can use one o' them tangleweb thingies to slow down yer enemies?
*: Eh? Why am I tellin' you this? Cor, I ain't got the foggiest, now you come to mention it... I must still be 'alf asleep...

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Room02_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Ohh, but it is you! Hello to you, friend, and thank you for all you have helped us with before!
*: I am still not having told the people of the village what occurred. Is this the right thing to do? I cannot decide...
*: And would they believe me? To have slept for several years is... I cannot completely believe in it myself...

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Room02_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Oh! I am having no idea who you might be, but you must return the dreamstone for us to the faeries, yes?
*: If you are not finding and returning it, all the people that you see here will be cursed to sleep forever!
*: The faeries dwell in a small village hidden in the woods by a cave that is west from here. Please! Help us!
*: I love so to play in my Grandpapa's house! It is so big and wide! Wheee!

Txt_Talk_Noaniel_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_2010_01.Text: ...and a monster is revealed before your eyes!
{LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
